alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 7:45AM EST until November 30 at 8:45AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Southeastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Western Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Early County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 845 AM EST/745 AM CST/. * At 745 AM EST/645 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Fort Gaines to Columbia to near Slocomb to 8 miles south of Geneva, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Cottonwood, Blakely, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Donalsonville, Bainbridge, Ashford, Arlington, Columbia, Chattahoochee, Douglasville, Centerville, Malone, Sneads, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood and Avon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
